text: Hanki ru moparegama umani'neta ruotge'ma hu'nea nagima eri havizama hu'naza nagia eriama hu'na ahentesga hugahue. E'inama hu'na nagima eriama hu'na hentesgama hanuge'za, anama umani'naza mopafi vahe'mo'za Nagrikura Ruotge hu'nea Ra Anumza mani'ne hu'za ke'za antahiza nehanage'na, Nagrani'a ruotge hu'noe hu'na eri ante ama hanuge'za zamagra kegahaze.
